remarks: A function which is odd and monotonic on ` NN0 ` is monotonic on ` ZZ ` .  This proof is far too long.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Sep-2014.)
statement:
monotoddzzfi.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ZZ ) -> ( F ` x ) e. RR ) $.
monotoddzzfi.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ZZ ) -> ( F ` -u x ) = -u ( F ` x ) ) $.
monotoddzzfi.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. NN0 /\ y e. NN0 ) -> ( x < y -> ( F ` x ) < ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
monotoddzzfi $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( A < B <-> ( F ` A ) < ( F ` B ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph x y $.
